metadata.name: “A message to give”
metadata.description:
We give what we have inside.

Through the path of her eyes, she can connect with our inner voice.

And as she walks through life, the strength of her spirit travels within bridges built with love. Seeing beyond, she can reach our hearts to awaken the great treasure of communication, the universal understanding of helping out of love, of growing and honoring our path.

What is done with love heals, and enhances the meaning of life.

This oil painting is dedicated to the inner strength, the will to live, help and heal. We can be the change makers, give a message with creativity, spreading and sharing all the goodness in your way: the gift to have the chance to be an example of mankind in your actions that honors life: Make it art.  

From the total proceeds from NFT sales and the original oil painting, 99 % will go directly to the @todosconemmita foundation.
